channel.title: easy on Journal
channel.description: Recent content in easy on Journal

item.title: Hack The Box: Busqueda
item.description: Overview Nmap Searchor 2.4.0 Shell as svc Detecting Root Path Exploiting some python scripts Overview Identify and exploit the vulnerable of Searchor Enumerate logs from a git repository to find user crendentials As this user, run a python script that lets us inspect enviroment variables from docker containers Obtain administrator credentials to log in gitea Analyze the script to spot a path misuse from an imported file Get root Nmap danp@local:~|⇒ nmap -sV -sC 10.

item.title: Hack The Box: MonitorsTwo
item.description: Overview Nmap Exploiting CVE-2022-46169 Container Enumeration Cracking Hashes Enumeration as Marcus Checking Out What is Running Rooting Containers Getting Root Intended Enumeration Path Overview Exploit cacti version 1.2.22 to get a shell inside a docker container Enumerate internal files to acess the database and find a hash for the user marcus Crack the blowfish hash with hashcat Ssh in as marcus Abuse CVE-2021-41091 to get root shell Nmap danp@local:~/Documents/HackTheBox/MonitorsTwo|⇒ nmap -sV -sC 10.

item.title: Hack The Box: Soccer
item.description: Sumary Sumary Overview Nmap Exploiting tiny file manager Authenticating with Default Credentials Uploading Malicious PHP File Internal Enumeration as www-data Obtaining Credentials With SQL Injection Privilage Escalation with doas + dstat Extra Mile Exploiting SQL Injection with SQLMap Overview Discover soccer.htb Brute force directories to find tinyfilemanager Exploit a file upload vulnerability to get an initial shell as www-data Internal enumeration to find the soc-player.soccer.htb name Exploit a SQL Injection vulnerability via websockets to get user and password for the user player ssh in as player Enumerate again and find that the user can run dstat as root through the doas program Get root Nmap danp@local:~|⇒ nmap -sV 10.
